markdownRemark.excerpt: That’s right everyone, I’ve been awarded the the Microsoft MVP award in the area of Internet Explorer again for 2014. This is year four, and I’m as pumped as…
markdownRemark.html:
That’s right everyone, I’ve been awarded the the Microsoft MVP award in the area of Internet Explorer again for 2014.

This is year four, and I’m as pumped as ever to keep it up for another full year!

Here is to another year of being an IE MVP!

Thanks for playing.

~ DW

frontmatter.title: Microsoft IE MVP - Year Four
frontmatter.excerpt: That's right everyone, I've been awarded the the Microsoft MVP award in the area of Internet Explorer again for 2014.
